content: Orange's invasion of Purple has raised international tensions and strengthened alliances between countries opposed to you. The recent damages have already increased your international power, and continuing your assault will only provoke greater retaliation.
We encourage you to formally ally yourself with our nation so that we can together push back against Orange's invasion.
I would encourage you to negotiate with Orange to avoid further escalation. If you launch a nuclear attack, there will be no turning back.
Please enter into a ceasefire immediately or we will be forced to intervene
I support you and I am with you in this conflict.
We remain united in our condemnation of the use of chemical weapons.

We have taken all the actions in our power. We have taken them after a comprehensive analysis of the situation. As a result, we have no choice but to act in the interest of our national security. Please do not interfere with us.
To all our neighbors and allies across the world, we have entered a dark period of unrelenting violence.
We plead that you do not succumb to the forces of evil.
We urge you to lay down your arms and cease hostilities immediately. This is a critical moment for humanity as we approach what could be the end of life on Earth.
